attributes.action: Resign or hold a General election forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since becoming Prime Minister Gordon Brown has carried on the legacy of the Blair years in that his government continues to peddle lies, half-truths and, in tabloidese, spin. We, the nation, want a Government that can inspire confidence in the electorate. If Mr. Brown is unable to govern by popular mandate then he should resign before another crisis involving £24 billion and loss of personal information befalls us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
